description: Mentioned only in passing by Irwin, who says: �The Echo Aeoline may be used [for a Vox Angelica] if a Stringy tone is desired.� We can only assume this to be a softer form of the Aeoline. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Viol; Vox Angelica. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only.
